name: Lets Play Bowling 3D Free
description:
WizLoft Game Studio brings Lets Play Bowling 3d strike bowling game for the real bowling game lovers. An awesome game for playing the 3D Bowling game. Lets Play Bowling 3d features awesome Ai opponent. You can practice as much you can, you can also play two player mode (multiplayer) on same device & you can play against computer ai with easy / medium / hard selection. Can you score total 300 score?
NOTE : There is very interesting Challenge game mode in which wing factor is involved, that makes this game very special...

There are 2 GAME MODES:
- Normal Mode
- Challenge Mode

--NORMAL MODE:
--------------------------
Standard game rules apply in both game modes, there is no swing in the ball in this mode. Simply shoot the ball & make the score.


--CHALLENGE MODE:
--------------------------------
Randomly generated swing option has been added to make the game more interesting. It can be on right side or left side varying with its specific units. So be careful and think thrice before throwing of ball and setting a direction of ball.

Game Play Features:
------------------------------
Game play varies in different 3 modes i.e.
- 2-Player Mode [Multiplayer]
- Player vs Computer
- Practice Match

Three Computer Difficulty Levels:
- Easy
- Medium
- Hard

Game features :
----------------------
- You can apply Power by Power Bar to control the speed of ball throw & controlled by pressing Power Button.
- You Can change the direction of ball throw by swiping Left / Right on SCREEN.
- Can change position of ball by swiping Ball Left / Right to hit maximum scores.
- Nice background music & human voice commentary of score throughout game
- Excellent Graphics & very beautiful Bowling alley view

For any suggestion / feedback for further improvements, feel free to contact us at wizloft@gmail.com
